description.default:
A quiet clearing has been set aside here just east of the city docks. You see a glinting vein of ore in a rock face, a small leafy plant, a young tree, and a small, quiet fishing pond. A path leads back west to the Docks Gate.

Several gathering tools have been left on the ground here.

objects.name: a small fishing pond
objects.description: A small, clear pond. It looks like a good spot to FISH.

objects.name: a pickaxe
objects.description: A sturdy pickaxe lies on the ground.

objects.name: a wood axe
objects.description: A heavy wood axe lies on the ground.

objects.name: a sickle
objects.description: A sharp sickle lies on the ground.

objects.name: a fishing pole
objects.description: A simple fishing pole lies on the ground.
